## Field.getText\_() method

A developer hook to override the returned text of this field. Override if the text representation of the value of this field is not just a string cast of its value. Return null to resort to a string cast.  Current text or null.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected getText_(): string | null;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

string \| null
